To sign up for Gmail, create a Google Account. You can use the username and password to sign in to Gmail and other Google products like YouTube, Google Play, and Google Drive. Sign up for a Gmail account Important: Before you set up a new Gmail account, make sure to sign out of your current Gmail account. Learn how to sign out of Gmail . From your device, go to the Google Account sign in page . Click Create account . In the drop down, select if the account is for your: Personal use Child Work or business To set up your account, follow the steps on the screen. Create an account Tip: To use Gmail for your business, a Google Workspace account might be better for you than a personal Google Account. With Google Workspace, you get increased storage, professional email addresses, and additional features. Learn about Google Workspace pricing and plans . Try Google Workspace The username I want is taken You can’t create a Gmail address if the username you requested is: Already being used. Very similar to an existing username. For example, if example@gmail.com already exists, you can't use examp1e@gmail.com. The same as a username that someone used in the past and then deleted. Reserved by Google to prevent spam or abuse.
